```{r}
library(polychart);
```

#PolyChart

```{r, echo=FALSE}

data = mtcars
x = 'wt'
y = 'mpg'
group = 'cyl'


library(ggplot2)

sp <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=wt, y=mpg)) + geom_point(shape=1, aes(colour=am)) 
gg <- sp + facet_grid(vs ~.) + ggtitle("This is the title!")

polychart(gg,data_cols=c("drat","hp","qsec"))
```
